name: Inner Child
description:
A short puzzle game where you escape the harsh reality of your adult self to solve puzzles with your childhood imagination. This game was developed with a team of seven, over four weeks for an assignment. 

Controls:

  • WASD  - Move character
  • Mouse - Move camera
  • Left Click - Lift/Interact with objects.
  • Right Click - Rotate lifted object.
  • Q - Reset rotation of the lifted object (Hold).
  • Space - Jump (child form only)
  • ESC - Pause menu

Programmers:

  • Michael Jordan
  • Rachael Colaco
  • William De Beer

Artists:

  • Fiona Cheung
  • William Lawrence
  • Peter Nguyen
  • Roger Painting
